As you may have heard or read, there was a confirmed shooting in Houghton Lake early this morning. The shooter, or shooters have not been apprehended. CHA does have multiple bus stops in Houghton Lake and specifically in the area of the shooting. In addition, with St. Helen being adjacent to Houghton Lake, closing school is the safest choice. Please know after school programs are NOT cancelled at this time. I will provide updates as they become available.

Thank you for your support to school safety.

David Patterson, Superintendent
